title: 4 man premade hold hostage
body:
so i get adc and I've been trying to get it all day becuase i wanna practice jinx. i get put in a 4 man premade and they litteraly complain that i got put as adc and ask me to go jg and top and when i say no they say i will get 4 reports and banns jinx. then i say i could take mid or supp but as i can't play a jungeler as a jungeler or litteraly any toplaner that isn't an option then they keep on complaining untill i decide 5 20 min leavebusters wouldnt bee so bad. wtf is wrong with pepole
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Those 4 reports would be worth jack sht and nothing would happen to you.

I think you had 2 options:

1. - go top and play ADC there. Because fck those guys, play what you wanted to and were supposed to.
2. - pick other ADC, go ADC mute them at the beginning of the game and go through the game with gritted teeth...

> [{quoted}](name=Inquisitor Kane,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ytmUYFr7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-02T17:37:02.972+0000)
>
> Those 4 reports would be worth jack sht and nothing would happen to you.
> 
> I think you had 2 options:
> 
> 1. - go top and play ADC there. Because fck those guys, play what you wanted to and were supposed to.
> 2. - pick other ADC, go ADC mute them at the beginning of the game and go through the game with gritted teeth...

personnaly i didn't have enugh energy to do any of those thing, i have a thing when i feel bad when muting pepole no matter how mutch of an asshole they are the main thing i have a problem with is that i have no way of fighting against it without staying n a 20 min + game

1. You shouldn't practice champ in ranked game
2. Premade is shiit, even 4 of them is worse than BOT game

> [{quoted}](name=Cpt Genie,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ytmUYFr7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-02T18:07:13.316+0000)
>
> 1. You shouldn't practice champ in ranked game
> 2. Premade is shiit, even 4 of them is worse than BOT game

it was not ranked i don't play it it was draft
